00030 void Config::default_game_setting() {
00031     disp_year_end_report = 1;
00032 
00033 #if(GAME_VERSION>=200)
00034     auto_save = 0;

00036     log_file_name[0] = '\0';                        // not include extension, which is .<year>, inital is empty, ask name in first log file

00038 #endif
00039 }
